title: Relic shield bug
body:
So after accidentally selling my relic shield and undo-ing it, I found that my relic shield icon/timer thingo disappeared. I had the blue animation thingo around my character but I couldn't execute a minion for the gold until I had another stack. I know for sure I had a stack of the relic shield beforehand but after I finally gained another stack, it only gave me one. Just found it really annoying that the relic shield shows the blue spherical animation (as I had a stack of relic shield when I sold the item) but I don't get to see the timer for the next stack, and when I do get the next stack, I don't have the two stacks I should have.

Not a gamebreaking bug but could affect games and not sure if anyone else has pointed it out so I thought I would.
